events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on incorrect product delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for order #457892.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item received. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with the order number? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Here is the photo of the item I received, which is different from what I ordered. My order number is 457892.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prompt refund and the easy service provided.
The refund request has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please allow some time for the refund to appear on your statement.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. We would appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
